content.html: Due to Royal Mail Groups attempts to destroy your local postal workers and the service they provide, today will be the final day of post before Christmas. We hope you understand what it has taken for postal workers to make this call. They need your support. #StandByYourPost
content.value:
Due to Royal Mail Groups attempts to destroy your local postal workers and the service they provide, today will be the final day of post before Christmas. 

We hope you understand what it has taken for postal workers to make this call. 

They need your support. 

#StandByYourPost
